mailBody:
Dear J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC Team,

I hope this message finds you well. 

As part of our ongoing compliance review process, we have completed an initial checklist based on the information we have for your organization. However, we have identified some items for which we require additional information to proceed further.

**Checklist of Missing Information:**

1. **Company Regulatory Compliance**: Specific details regarding regulations under review or with medium/high risk levels.
2. **Company PEP Screening**: Details regarding matches that may require additional documentation.

We would appreciate it if you could provide the missing information at your earliest convenience to ensure a smooth continuation of our review process.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. We look forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Contact Information]  
[Your Organization]
